MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH6 postcode area of Flint, affecting properties in Lloyd Street and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:15PM on 31st March 2021.
